title: LISTEN: EFL Matters podcast - Simon Grayson and Danny Higginbotham join David Prutton
description: Listen to the EFL Matters podcast, as Simon Grayson and Danny Higginbotham join David Prutton to discuss all the latest talking points in the Championship, League One and League Two.
content: The panel discuss all the key January signings in the Sky Bet Championship, including the move of Gary Madine from Bolton to Cardiff and the ramifications that could have at both ends of the table.Tim Cahill's return to Millwall is also on the agenda while there is also a look ahead to the Friday night game between Bolton and Bristol City, which is live on Sky Sports Football.The transfer business in League One and League Two is then assessed, before the panel take a look at Nick Powell and the form of Wigan, and Newport's heroics in the FA Cup.Listen to the EFL Matters podcast and subscribe to more via iTunes
